title: Keystone GIS
image-alt: screen shot of the website www.pamagic.org
teaser: I led a team in rebuilding the organization's website on the Drupal CMS platform.  Later, I led switching to the Wild Apricot platform.  I continue to serve on the Technology Committee.

title: Local Weather Forecast
image-alt: screen shot of website that displays local weather forecast
teaser: A website that displays the weather forecast based on the user's current location.  Forecast data is requested from the National Weather Service API.
